item.title: Introduction to Beagles: Your Guide to This Playful and Loyal Breed - FurryTails
item.description: Introduction to Beagles: Your Guide to This Playful and Loyal Breed Introduction Beagles are one of the most popular dog breeds, known for their friendly and lively personalities.
